h2.a: Please visit the Trojan Wellness Page for all information

p.span: Cambridge Public Schools is located in Cambridge, Nebraska. We offer schooling for grades Pre-Kindergarten to twelfth grade. The Cambridge School Community is on a mission to prepare students as life-long learners in a supportive environment.
